scripts.create-venv: python3 -m venv venv && echo 'Python virtual environment created'
scripts.generate-requirements: venv/bin/pip freeze > requirements.txt || echo 'Failed to generate requirements.txt'
scripts.install-python: venv/bin/pip install -r requirements.txt || echo 'requirements.txt not found'
scripts.postinstall: npm run create-venv && npm run install-python && npm run generate-requirements
